mapper.select: SELECT * , USER_ID as userId , REG_DT as regDt , UDT_DT as udtDt FROM USER WHERE email = #{email}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER(user_id, name , email, password, phone, address, status, reg_dt) VALUES(#{userId}, #{name}, #{email}, #{password}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{status}, #{regDt})
mapper.update: UPDATE USER SET status = #{status}, udt_dt = NOW() WHERE user_id = #{userId}
UPDATE USER SET phone = #{phone}, address = #{address}, udt_dt = NOW() WHERE user_id = #{userId}
